attributes.action: Limit corporate donations to political parties
attributes.additional_details: The parliament needs to protect British democracy from foreign corporate interference. By limiting the amount of donations that corporations are able to donate to political parties we assure that a healthy balance between economic might and individual participation is maintained
attributes.background: Limit corporate donations to political parties to 10% of their post tax profits in the UK

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a similar action: 

Tighten the rules on political donations
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707189
